original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 321.00/323.00 to the US dollar, bond yields unchanged
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s spot next rupee closed at 321.00/323.00 to the US dollar on Monday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 321.00/323.50 to the US dollar on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was closed down at 13.20/40 closing on Friday at 13.30/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was closed at 13.40/60 percent unchanged from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was closed at 14.35/40 percent unchanged from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was closed at 14.55/70 percent down from closing at 14.60/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was closed at 15.90/16.05 unchanged from the previous close. (Colombo/Aug03/2023)
